directions: Mix salmon, mayonnaise, celery, bread crumbs, lemon juice, dill, liquid smoke, and Cajun seasoning together in a bowl. Form salmon mixture into a mold on a plate and loosely cover with plastic wrap; refrigerate, 8 hours to overnight. Garnish with lemon slices and parsley.
ingredients: 1 (6 ounce) can salmon, bones and skin removed
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, or to taste (optional)
title: Roberta's Smoked Salmon Dip
